review: Loved it except.  When you use your voice to find a movie etc, it comes up, but wants you to pay to watch it?  Yet I already can get it free with Amazon Prime and Netflix.  What's with that?
author: katymickey

review: I recently wrote a poor review for Fire TV and was going to try to edit it after everything was resolved but was unable to find it so here's an update!!My replacement remote does not eat batteries and works exceptionally well!!  Also, my receiver was intermittently locking up and one of the Amazon Techs talked me through clearing the "Cache" and now it works PERFECTLY!!  This is worth knowing how to do!!The quality of the video and audio are extremely good and it is MUCH EASIER to navigate than Netflix is through my Blu-Ray!!Thanks again Amazon!!
author: CoosawJack

review: This i amazing...my kids and I love it.  I no longer pay a cable bill.  Internet only, Amazon Fire TV and all is good
author: Ronald L Louchart Jr

review: This was terrible. Maybe I got an early on dud, but it was jumpy, and skipped/buffered on Netflix constantly. It isn't my bandwidth, my dusty old Apple TV works like a champ.
author: Simpson

review: I love this! I decided that I no longer wanted a cable bill and so I decided to try this out. I have had it for over 6 months now and have not looked back. I save over $100 a month not paying for cable and I just pay for internet. I pay for the prime membership and Hulu and I have everything I need to watch through that.The remote is amazing...you just hold the button and speak, and it finds exactly what you asked for.Highly recommend!
author: Anastasia

review: Microphone system works well, but always brings you to programs that you have to rent. I want free programs when i make a selection. I eliminate using the microphone system for search and go back to the manual selection system to search for a program on netflix or hulu plus.
author: SANDY HANBERG

review: It was really easy to set up on my tv. I am a Prime member and there are alot of good movies. There are games and other apps on the Amazon Fire TV. The voice control works well also.
author: Waynetta

review: I have owned several streaming products, including the original Google TV. I have two Smart TVs, both of which have a ton of issues connecting and resuming. in my opinion, the Amazon fire TV is the best solution for streaming, especially if you are a prime subscriber.I would put it against the chromecast or Apple TV.
author: Digitalmaster

review: We use this everyday for my son. I love how you can download apps and watch for free. I wish I would have known how much isn't free though. I guess I didn't do my research. All in all I'm glad I have it.
author: Brittney
